text:
"Mission California" is Cross Canadian Ragweed's fourth studio album. It was released on October 2, 2007. The band spent 25 days in the studio. It was recorded in San Diego, California. Lee Ann Womack did background vocals on 4 of the songs to include the Chris Knight cover "Cry Lonely."
Track listing.
Hidden Track: "On The Right Path" begins at 6:15 on "NYCG"
